Deris adalah bekas banduan yang cuba untuk berubah tetapi tidak mampu bertahan dan isthiqomah Deris. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Pisau Cukur
programme.desc: Apa yang berlaku apabila pemangsa dan mangsa terperangkap di atas kapal persiaran mewah? Dua gadis mata duitan, Bella dan Intan, berhadapan dengan tiga orang Datuk, tiga isteri Datuk, dua anak Datuk, seorang detektif persendirian, dan seorang peminat fanatik Bella. Siapakah pemangsa dan siapakah mangsa? Dalam pelayaran yang penuh dengan kejutan, apa sahaja boleh berlaku!

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil 2
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Fadil yang terjerumus ke dalam dunia mafia yang diketuai oleh Taji Samprit dan anaknya, Wak Doyok. Satu insiden menyebabkan Inspektor Wahab dan Inspektor Shuib mengesyaki Fadil sebagai Tiger, seorang pembunuh upahan profesional.

programme.title: Taikun
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua lelaki bernama Tai dan Kun, sahabat baik yang hanya meminati pergaduhan dan mencuri. Apabila tabiat buruk mereka menyebabkan mereka bertembung dan memukul teruk ahli geng Pink dan Purple, Tai dan Kun kemudian direkrut oleh ketua geng yang kagum dengan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi

Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Mereka Yang Pergi Ep20
programme.desc: Mengungkap kisah-kisah menyentuh hati di sekeliling kita, tentang mereka yang kehilangan insan tersayang. Mampukah mereka kembali dalam kehangatan keluarga?

programme.title: The Sultan Empire Ep14
programme.desc: The Sultan Empire merupakan bentuk baharu Sultan, iaitu sebuah rancangan komedi sketsa bertemakan kerajaan yang dipenuhi dengan bintang jemputan.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep16
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Jiwa Ketar Ketir Melihat Senyum Manismu
programme.desc: Melodi akan berkahwin dengan Bastian tidak lama lagi. Namun, Melodi dan Bastian nampaknya bergaduh besar di jalan raya. Akibat pertengkaran itu, Melodi menghilangkan diri. Kejadian ini membuat Bastian berasa kehilangan dan dimarahi bapanya. Akhirnya, dia mencari keberadaan gadis tersebut.

programme.title: Inbox 2022 Ep13
programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep84
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Lampung Geh Ep3
programme.desc: Dokumentari perjalanan yang merakam keunikan Lampung, daripada keindahan alam semula jadi hingga pelbagai aktiviti menarik.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep240
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Ujian Berat Pedagang Kaos Kaki yang Bertekad Mengubah Nasibnya
programme.desc: Syawal menjalankan perniagaan menjual stkoing secara berkeliling setiap hari demi menyara keluarga kecilnya. Namun sayangnya, keadaan kesihatan Syawal semakin teruk kerana penyakit. Malah, isterinya marah kepada Syawal kerana terus menerus sakit dan bagaimana dia mampu memperolehi pendapatan.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa Vol. 2 - Danang Ksatria Banyuwangi
programme.desc: Konser Luar Biasa Vol. 2 - Danang Ksatria Banyuwangi meraikan kejayaan dan perjalanan Danang Ksatria Banyuwangi. Menampilkan barisan bintang hebat dengan persembahan luar biasa, acara ini penuh dengan kemeriahan dan keistimewaan.

programme.title: Lara Ati Ep1
programme.desc: Cerita ini berkisar tentang empat orang lelaki yang hadir untuk satu sama lain dan saling membantu menghadapi sakit hati (lara ati) yang mereka alami dalam kehidupan masing-masing.

programme.title: Ujian Berat Pedagang Kaos Kaki yang Bertekad Mengubah Nasibnya
programme.desc: Syawal menjalankan perniagaan menjual stkoing secara berkeliling setiap hari demi menyara keluarga kecilnya. Namun sayangnya, keadaan kesihatan Syawal semakin teruk kerana penyakit. Malah, isterinya marah kepada Syawal kerana terus menerus sakit dan bagaimana dia mampu memperolehi pendapatan.

programme.title: Inbox 2022 Ep14
programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep85
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep241

programme.title: Akhir Tragis Istri Munafik Yang Pintar Bersilat Lidah
programme.desc: Ibu kandung Bastian datang meminta untuk tinggal bersamanya kerana dia menghidap asma yang semakin teruk. Di hadapan suaminya, dia berpura-pura baik, tetapi di belakangnya, dia melayan ibu mertuanya seperti seorang pembantu, memaksanya melakukan kerja-kerja rumah.

programme.title: Memory of China Ep19

programme.title: Nostalgia Ep11
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Zhan Tian Lang Ep8
programme.desc: The play tells the story of how Wu Shisan and others escaped from the Japanese search during the Anti-Japanese War and followed the main force southward. They then launched an anti-Japanese guerrilla war, exterminated traitors and defended the country, resisted the Japanese encirclement and suppression, and finally ushered in the victory of the Anti-Japanese War.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep30
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4913
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2329
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep4012
programme.desc: <Stylish Man - The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep272
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep29
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2009
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep33
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4151
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Cham and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Cham's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Lohs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.desc: Costa Rica - Robson is on the trail of tuna, machaca and the mighty sail fish off the coast of Costa Rica in Central America.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The lion pride males are injured and the mothers with cubs are left vulnerable after an attack; Xudum, the female leopard, takes risks to find a mate.

programme.title: Paddy and Chris: Road Tripping S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweden - Paddy and Chris head to Sweden to get back to nature and embody 'friluftsliv'. It can lower stress and improve mental health, but can they embrace nature to get the reboot needed?

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Series 4 - In Texas and Mexico, the first Atlantic hurricane of the season makes landfall, creating dangerous flooding and widespread destruction. A tornado outbreak unleashes carnage on Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana. In Utah, a brushfire threatens to engulf drivers

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ireland - Explore an island surrounded by the mighty Atlantic ocean, subjected to pounding waves and driving rain. From the Cliffs of Moher to the Giants Causeway, this land has been shaped and reshaped by the power of water and violent geological forces.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cool South - Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep2

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep5
programme.desc: A Pangolin's Plight - Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocodile Capers - Strap in for Dr. Amandas risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, whos headed back to the wild.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canadas only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Fight Club - Step into the ring with natures top brawlers, who use violence to get what they need. Watch the cannibalistic Portia spider devour the competition, uncover the bloodthirsty side of cuddly koalas, and catch an epic neck-whipping giraffe battle.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Gangsters - Get inside the toughest gangs that roam the Earth and see what true grit looks like in the wild. Chase a band of marauding locusts, watch the coconut octopus ambush its next meal, and meet a flock of finches whove developed a taste for blood.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Shark Squad S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Island of the White Shark - Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.desc: Wildwood Sanitarium - Nick and Katrina go to Wildwood Sanitorium. After its conversion into apartments, tenants reported an unnerving male presence and furniture being rearranged.

programme.title: Ufo Witness S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Arcturians And Black Triangles - Alarmingly advanced UFOs may pose a threat to the future of humanity. Ben and Melissa head to Las Vegas to investigate whether these claims are true.

programme.title: Extreme Rvs S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Entegra Cornerstone Renegade Ikon Global Expeditio - Renegade RV builds a custom IKON, and Entegra Coach produces high-end RVs en masse. A Global Expedition Vehicle has humble beginnings.

programme.title: 18 Wheels Across Indonesia S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Journeys End - David Andres drives his truck across spectacular regions of Indonesia.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Dark Forest - The AIMS team enters the Dark Forest to capture the Woman of the Woods.

programme.title: Hotel Impossible S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Bromley Sun Lodge - Anthony travels to the Vermont ski slopes to help the failing Bromley Sun Lodge.

programme.title: Expedition X S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Beasts Of Britain - In England, Jess and Phil search for a legendary beast that's said to stalk the wilderness. After an encounter, they realise the creature is more than a myth.

programme.title: Ufo Witness S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Pleiadians And Alien Conspiracy - Ben and Melissa explore a recent trend that has them concerned. Are extra-terrestrials brainwashing their victims in a plot to dominate humanity?

programme.title: Island Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Purchasing A Summer Island In Ontario, Canada - A Toronto-based couple and their two children shop for and purchase an island in northern Ontario.

programme.title: Island Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hunt For A Luxury Island In Georgia - Two business partners hunt for an island to host their children's charity camp.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Black Wolf - The AIMS team learns that a mysterious creature known as the Black Wolf roams the Dark Forest.

programme.title: Expedition X S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Transylvanian Terror - The team explore a haunted forest near the site of the Dracula legend. During a night investigation, Jess is watched by someone or something sinister.

programme.desc: With exclusive footage and brand-new interviews with the children of our favourite music stars, MTV's Family Legacy gives fans a fresh take on some of MTV's celebrated events. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep26
programme.desc: Game of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep35
programme.desc: The Battle of Tianshang Part 2 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep36
programme.desc: The Pangea-ing - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep34
programme.desc: Coin Toss - Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep33
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep34
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought - When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep17
programme.desc: Berry Race / The Artist - The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Zippleback Down - While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: View To A Skrill (Part 1) - Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: Live and let Fly - Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep17
programme.desc: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks - When Tip can't solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he can't "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank'd - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep17
programme.desc: Racetrack - Ton-Ton's friends, The 'Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep17
programme.desc: Chilling Out in Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes will it work?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep18
programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When the towns well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep27
programme.desc: Tails in the Seats / Roadside Distraction - When Sam Whippet asks Tag to help fill every seat in the Speedway for his big race, Tag zips around Pawston seeking out dogs. But it wont be easy, as it happens to be a very busy day in town. A very distracted Beans makes Tags task even harder. / When pup-star Kelly Korgi announces a contest where shell pick her favorite Roadside Attraction to star in her new music video, Tag and Scooch are excited to enter Pawston. Now they just have to build one. And they have to do it fast.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep28
programme.desc: Tough Cookies / More Than Meets the Tie - Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippets Chocolate Chippets the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yips birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep37
programme.desc: The Poison Ravine - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep36
programme.desc: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies - When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep18
programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can - When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid shell embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: The Iron Gronkle - When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: The Night And the Fury - The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When the towns well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: The Iron Gronkle - When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: The Night And the Fury - The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When the towns well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep18
programme.desc: Waltor / Out Foxed - When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep18
programme.desc: Gluphosaurus - When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to unstick the crew from one another.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem in Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Peanut Butter & Jelly / Potato Skins - Chef tries to make the Stump Band the best peanut butter and jelly sandwiches during their Snack Break. // It's Potato Day, Henry's favorite holiday! Chef wants to whip up Henry's favorite potato dish.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Peanut Butter & Jelly - Chef tries to make the Stump Band the best peanut butter and jelly sandwiches during their Snack Break.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep403
programme.desc: The Chicken Circus! - Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery - Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1112
programme.desc: Pups Save the Yumi Bee - Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1011
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Falling Space Junk / Pups Stop the Giant Cuckoo - When Digi & Tal's space vacuum breaks it's up to the pups to save Mayor Humdinger from falling space debris.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save A Teeny Penguin - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hair Salon / The Crew Builds A Colorful Crystal Show - Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show - Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town!

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Sharkdog Digs In - Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chlo's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery - Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck.
