programme.desc: It's Time to Write a Book - JoJo and Gran Gran are at the library trying to find a new Captain Chloe book, but it seems that she's read them all. JoJo asks Terrence the librarian if there's a book about Captain Chloe and pandas.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Ragdoll - Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Wedding Badge - King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Sleeping Badge - Tag is having trouble sleeping, so Duggee offers him a few tricks to help him.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Garlic - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's fitness guru, Garlic, with a set of fun exercises to make you stronger.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Avocado - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the fabulous Avocados singing an operatic piece in their three unique voices.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Tablet Takeover - The Veggies are delighted with a new tablet they've found. When they're not looking, Evil Pea turns the tablet to evil mode. Soon the tablet takes over the supermarket.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Carrot's Big Top - Carrot is starring in a circus, but problems arise when Evil Pea meddles with her tricks.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Spinning - The Teletubbies travel by Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they all spin around on the Tubby Spinny.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep26
programme.desc: Z - Dee encourages a friend to say 'z', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some zips, do some zooming and see some zebras crossing a road!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Say Cheese - Mae-Mae accidentally loses Phoebe's special photo album and must use Zip's camera to replace it.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Second Chances - Messy helps his friends find Zoe's lost communicator, which has ended up in the recycling. Luckily for Zoe, Zim is magnetic!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep37
programme.desc: The Decider - The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep15
programme.desc: On the move - Andy Day tries to keep up with young animals on the move. In the Arctic, guillemot chicks leap from clifftop nests, and chacma baboons walk upright to reach the best food.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Super Predator - What does it take to be the fiercest and most mighty super predator of all time? Young spinosaurus is on a quest to find out.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Mission: New Sound - Diesel hears a new sound while helping his owner Rayane with the Sunday chores. What could it be?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Pygmy Marmoset and Orb Weaver Spider - This episode features the Pygmy Marmoset and the Golden Orb Weaver Spider - their wild connection is they both make traps.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep16
programme.desc: Bad Luck Bananas - Lots of bananas have washed up on the island, which worries Captain Captain as legend has it bananas on a ship is bad luck.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Wombless Ep2
programme.desc: The Fight for Change (English Subtitles) - For over a decade, activists and government officials have been fighting back against the practice of unnecessary hysterectomies in India. From spreading awareness, to raiding faulty clinics and legal battles, we learn about the fight to protect women against unscrupulous medical practitioners who rob them of their wombs.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the days events.

programme.title: The Last Defenders S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Last Defenders Of Vietnam - Anti-poaching officers Lam and Julong risk their lives facing violent poachers and the unpredictable elements to protect the wildlife of Cat Tien National Park in Vietnam from possible extinction.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.
